trans-unit.source: Provides a string that describes an individual configuration property.
trans-unit.target: 提供一个字符串，描述的单独的配置属性。

trans-unit.source: The SettingsDescriptionAttribute is intended to assist both design time tools and administrative run time tools in identifying and describing the associated configuration property.
trans-unit.target: SettingsDescriptionAttribute 旨在帮助进行标识和关联的配置属性描述的设计时工具和管理运行的时工具。

trans-unit.source: This attribute is optional and can only be applied at the individual configuration property level.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是可选的只能在单独的配置属性级别应用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.SettingsDescriptionAttribute"></xref> class.

Although the description has a theoretical maximum length of the <xref:System.String> class, whose length is represented by a <xref:System.Int32>, the following two practical considerations will limit the size of the `description` parameter: - Large text descriptions are difficult to display in a user interface (UI) and difficult for the user to read.
trans-unit.target: 尽管说明具有理论最大长度为<xref:System.String>类，其长度由<xref:System.Int32>，以下两个实际的考量将限制的大小`description`参数:-较大的文本说明很难显示在用户界面 (UI) 和用户阅读困难。</xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: - Settings providers may enforce overall usage quotas and are required to enforce user configuration quotas.
trans-unit.target: 设置提供程序可能会强制实施的总体使用配额和所需强制用户配置配额的限制。

trans-unit.source: Gets the descriptive text for the associated configuration property.
trans-unit.target: 获取关联的配置属性的说明性文本。

trans-unit.source: The Description property is set by the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsDescriptionAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
A <xref:System.String> containing the descriptive text for the associated configuration property.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含关联的配置属性的说明性文本。</xref:System.String>
